changes.summary: Patch XSS vulnerability in user input handling
changes.description:
A cross-site scripting vulnerability was discovered in user input processing.

## Release Note

Fixed a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in user input handling. This security patch prevents malicious scripts from being executed through user-generated content.

changes.summary: Fix database connection timeout in high-load scenarios
changes.description:
Database connections were timing out under high load, causing service interruptions.

## Release Note

Fixed database connection timeout issues that could occur during high-traffic periods. The system now handles concurrent connections more efficiently.

changes.summary: Resolve keyboard shortcut conflicts in Firefox
changes.description:
Some keyboard shortcuts were conflicting with Firefox's built-in shortcuts.

## Release Note

Resolved keyboard shortcut conflicts with Firefox browser. All application shortcuts now work correctly across different browsers.

changes.summary: Optimize search indexing for better performance
changes.description:
Search indexing was taking too long for large datasets, affecting user experience.

## Release Note

Optimized search indexing process, reducing indexing time by up to 60% for large datasets. Search results now appear faster and system responsiveness is improved.

changes.summary: Add progress indicators for long-running operations
changes.description:
Users had no feedback during long operations like data exports or bulk updates.

## Release Note

Added progress indicators for long-running operations including data exports, bulk updates, and large file uploads. Users now receive real-time feedback on operation status.

changes.summary: Update API documentation for OAuth2 migration
changes.description:
API documentation needed updates to reflect the OAuth2 migration and deprecation of basic auth.

## Release Note

Updated API documentation with comprehensive OAuth2 migration guide and examples. Includes step-by-step instructions for transitioning from basic authentication.
